trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Agdon is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if he fails, provided he isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: 阿格登的跳远最高可达20英尺，跳高最高可达10英尺，无论是否有跑步起步。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿格登进行两次烙铁或匕首攻击。

action.name: Branding Iron
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害，并且目标会被魔法烙印。艾格登对以这种方式烙印的生物有{@condition invisible}的伤害。烙印在24小时后消失，或者它可以被任何结束诅咒的法术从生物或物体上去除。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5})穿刺伤害。

bonus.name: Quick Fingers
entries: Agdon targets one creature within 5 feet of him that he can see and makes a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check, with a DC equal to 1 + the target's passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score. On a successful check, Agdon pilfers one object weighing 1 pound or less that the target has in its possession but not in its grasp, without the target noticing the theft.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 艾格登从击中他的攻击中受到的伤害减半。他必须能够看到攻击者。

trait.name: Brave
entries: Alagarthas has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Alagarthas has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Alagarthas进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4次暴击伤害。

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, Alagarthas can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand him. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Alagarthas is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: 阿米多可以与野兽和植物交流，就像它与它们共享一种语言一样。

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Seed Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})重击伤害。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Amidor在对抗一次会击中它的近战攻击时，会增加2的攻击力。要做到这一点，Amidor必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bavlorna casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 巴弗洛纳可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Boon of Immortality
entries: 巴弗洛娜对任何会使她变老的效果都有免疫力，而且她不会因年老而死亡。

trait.name: Widdershins Allergy
entries: If a creature within 10 feet of Bavlorna uses at least 10 feet of movement to run in place counterclockwise, Bavlorna is overcome by a fit of sneezing and can't cast spells until the end of her next turn. In addition, any creature Bavlorna has swallowed is immediately expelled and falls {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of her.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巴弗洛纳进行一次咬人攻击和一次枯萎射线攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})穿刺伤害，如果目标是中型或小型生物，则为{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 16})。直到抓取结束，目标为{@condition restrained}，巴弗洛娜不能对其他目标使用她的咬合攻击。

action.name: Withering Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6}击中，范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3})坏死性伤害。

action.name: Create Lornlings {@recharge 5}
entries: Bavlorna创造了一个或两个1英尺高的自己的复制品，称为lornlings（使用附录C的Quickling状态块）。每个lornling出现在Bavlorna周围5英尺范围内的空地上，听从她的命令，并在她之后立即轮到它。lornling持续1小时，直到它或Bavlorna死亡，或直到Bavlorna用行动将其解散。Bavlorna在同一时间可以有不超过8个lornling存在。

bonus.name: Swallow
entries: Bavlorna swallows a Small or smaller creature she is grappling, ending the grapple on it. The swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Bavlorna, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. If the swallowed creature is one of Bavlorna's lornlings, Bavlorna gains all the lornling's memories when the acid damage reduces it to 0 hit points.
巴弗洛娜一次只能吞下一个生物。如果Bavlorna死亡，被吞食的生物不再是{@condition restrained}，并且可以使用5英尺的移动距离从尸体上逃脱，退出{@condition prone}。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The brigganock casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 11}):

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The brigganock has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Soul Light
entries: 桥头堡伴随着一个没有实体的、无坚不摧的光球，里面有它的灵魂。布里格诺克不能关闭光线，也不能控制其亮度。灵魂之光在10英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺范围内发出暗光。如果旅鼠死了，它的灵魂之光就会消逝。

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: 使用镐头或类似的工具，旅鼠可以以5英尺的速度钻过坚硬的岩石，在其身后留下一条6英寸直径的隧道。

action.name: Pickaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Time Lapse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 砖家会加速自己周围的时间流逝，使它能够在几秒钟内完成长达1小时的工作。这项工作不能影响除它之外的任何生物，也不能影响其他生物所穿戴或携带的任何物品，而且活动必须发生在10英尺的立方体内。例如，旅鼠可以用这个动作来快速地雕刻一个南瓜，做饭和吃晚饭，移动一堆石头，或者在一段绳子上打十几个结。

bonus.name: Move Soul Light
entries: 桥头堡将它的灵魂之光向任何方向最多移动30英尺，到一个它能看到的无人的空间。在当前回合结束时，灯光会回到旅鼠的身上。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 骑士可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: 骑士在用Bullywug说话时可以向青蛙和蟾蜍传达简单的概念。

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: 骑士的跳远最高可达20英尺，跳高最高可达10英尺，无论是否有跑步起步。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 骑士进行了两次 "玻璃刀 "攻击。

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

bonus.name: Croak of Charming (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 骑士发出响亮的呱呱声，同时瞄准30英尺内它能看到的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 12}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被{@condition charmed}，直到其下一个回合结束。

monster.name: Campestri
languages: understands Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: campestri可以模仿它所听到的任何声音或歌曲，尽管是用鼻音假声。

action.name: Head Butt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}1次暴击伤害。

action.name: Spores (1/Day)
entries: 孢子的半径为5英尺，从坎佩斯特里延伸出来。这些孢子可以绕过角落，而且对建筑、元素、植物或亡灵没有影响。该区域内的其他生物必须做一个{@dc 10}智慧拯救动作。如果救赎失败，该生物将受到1%的伤害，其速度减半，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功，则结束对它的影响。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 爪爪不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Stuffing
entries: 爪爪将稻草或其他死的植物物质塞进自己体内，恢复{@dice 2d4 + 2}的命中率。掷出{@dice d6}；如果是1或2，爪爪就会耗尽填充物，必须花8个小时去觅食，然后才能再次使用这个动作。

bonus.name: Unsettling Presence {@recharge}
entries: 爪子的目标是在它15英尺范围内它能看到的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 11}智慧救赎中成功，否则会被魔法{@condition frightened}，直到爪爪的下一个回合结束。

action.name: Strength Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target falls {@condition unconscious} if this reduces its Strength to 0. The creature regains consciousness and the reduction to its Strength score disappears after it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}2个重击伤害加上2个穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Elkhorn wields a {@item +1 longsword}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 艾尔克霍恩进行两次匕首或+1长剑攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 3}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺伤害。如果目标是大型或更大的生物，它会受到额外的5({@damage 1d10})穿刺伤害。

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d8})的砍击伤害，或在双手使用时造成5 ({@damage 1d10}的砍击伤害。如果目标是大型或更大的生物，则会受到额外的5({@damage 1d10})砍击伤害。

bonus.name: Feint {@recharge 5}
entries: Elkhorn targets one creature that he can see within 5 feet of him. Elkhorn has advantage on the next attack roll he makes against that target before the end of his turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage of the weapon's type.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 艾尔克霍恩恢复了12点生命值。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Endelyn casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Boon of Immortality
entries: 恩德林对任何会使她衰老的效果都有免疫力，她也不会因年老而死亡。

trait.name: Eclipsed Doom
entries: 恩德林只有在日食期间被降低到0命中率时，或者当她在一个象征性的日食的60英尺范围内时，才会被杀死。否则，当Endelyn的命中率降至0时，她会在一团墨色的烟雾中消失，连同她所穿戴或携带的东西，并在24小时后重新出现在同一地点或最近的无人空间。

trait.name: Uncanny Awareness
entries: Endelyn can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 恩德林进行两次 "傀儡廻 "的攻击

action.name: Puppeteer's Lash
entries: {@atk ms,rs}{@hit 6}命中，达到5英尺或范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3})精神伤害，如果目标是大型或更小，恩德林心灵感应地将其在任何方向水平移动10英尺。

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: 如果Envy向一个生物直接移动至少20英尺，然后在同一回合用咬的方式攻击它，该目标必须成功进行{@dc 16}的力量蓄力，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。如果目标是{@condition prone}，恩维可以用爪子对其进行一次攻击作为额外动作。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})重击伤害。

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Envy exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the rocking horse is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the rocking horse move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the rocking horse is animate.

trait.name: Flying Mount
entries: 摇摆马可以作为中型或小型生物的坐骑，只有在骑乘时才能飞行。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 摇摆马不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠，而且在长期休息结束时，它不会恢复命中率或命中值。

action.name: Head Butt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})重击伤害。

trait.name: Drone
entries: 当它拍打翅膀时，蜻蜓发出响亮的鸣叫声，可在120英尺范围内听到。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 蜻蜓在能看到攻击者的情况下，从对它的攻击中受到的伤害减半。

trait.name: Salt Osmosis
entries: Whenever the snail starts its turn in contact with a pound or more of salt, it takes {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage. Using an action to sprinkle a pound of salt on the snail deals {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage to it immediately and another {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage to it at the start of its next turn (after which the salt rubs off), provided the snail has not withdrawn into its shell.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})重击伤害。

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: 蜗牛缩进它的壳里，获得+4的攻击力加成，直到它出现。它可以在自己的回合中作为一个额外动作从壳中出来。

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The swan has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 天鹅用它的喙进行两次攻击。

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

monster.name: Glass Pegasus
languages: Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})重击伤害。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the golem is embedded in a window and motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the golem move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the golem is animate.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: 傀儡对任何会改变其形态的法术或效果都是免疫的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 傀儡在其回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果魔像受到重击或雷击伤害，这个特性在魔像的下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有当巨魔在其回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时，巨魔才会被摧毁。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 傀儡不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 傀儡做出两次玻璃剑攻击。

action.name: Glass Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})砍击伤害。

bonus.name: Dazzling Light {@recharge 5}
entries: 神奇的彩光从巨魔身上涌出，形成一个15英尺的圆锥体。锥体中的每个生物都必须在宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则将在1分钟内受到{@dc 10}的影响。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}1次砍击伤害。

action.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: 在它战斗的第一个回合或当它的命中率降至0时，猫会排出一团灰尘，作为打喷嚏和窒息的灰尘。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The harengon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the harengon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: 哈伦贡的跳远可达20英尺，跳高可达10英尺，无论是否有跑步起步。

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})重击伤害。

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: 哈伦贡的跳远可达20英尺，跳高可达10英尺，无论是否有跑步起步。

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})重击伤害。

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw}{@hit 5}命中(目标不会从低于全部覆盖物中获得好处)，范围320英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。命中或未命中：在进行这次攻击后，哈伦贡可以立即使用隐藏动作。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Iggwilv casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Boon of Immortality
entries: Iggwilv对任何会使她变老的效果都有免疫力，而且她不会因为年老而死亡。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Iggwilv的拯救动作失败，她可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Iggwilv在面对法术和其他魔法效果的时候有优势。(这个特性是由她的大法师袍赋予的）。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Iggwilv wears an {@item amulet of the planes} and a {@item robe of the archmagi}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Iggwilv进行了两次Bewitching Bolt攻击。

action.name: Bewitching Bolt
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 16}击中，达到5英尺或范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}25 ({@damage 5d6 + 8})的闪电伤害，如果目标是生物，它必须在{@dc 22}智慧救赎中成功，否则会被Iggwilv{@condition charmed}，直到她下一个回合开始。

action.name: Abyssal Rift {@recharge 5}
entries: Iggwilv在她周围120英尺范围内打开一个瞬间的深渊裂缝。裂缝是一个半径为20英尺的球体。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 22}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到40({@damage 9d8})的坏死伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。此外，有50%的几率会有3个{@creature hezrou||hezrous}出现在球体中未被占用的空间。他们作为Iggwilv的盟友，在她之后立即进行回合，并且不能召唤其他恶魔。他们会一直存在，直到他们死亡或Iggwilv以行动方式将他们解散。

bonus.name: Fey Step
entries: Iggwilv连同她所穿戴或携带的任何装备，都会被传送到她所看到的30英尺范围内无人的空间。

reaction.name: Negate Spell (2/Day)
entries: 当Iggwilv看到她60英尺范围内的生物在施法时，她会试图打断它。如果该生物正在使用8级或更低的法术槽施法，则其施法失败，没有效果。如果它施放的是9级的法术，它必须在一个{@dc 22}智力救赎中成功，否则法术就会失败并且没有效果。

legendary.name: Witchcraft
entries: Iggwilv使用咒语或Fey步骤。

legendary.name: Dark Speech (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Iggwilv用禁忌的语言说出一句话，并以她周围60英尺内的一个或两个她能看到的生物为目标。每个目标必须在智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到11（（1%））的精神伤害，并在1分钟内被Iggwilv（2%）。目标可以在每个回合结束时重复救赎，如果成功则结束对自己的影响，从而在24小时内对Iggwilv的黑暗演讲免疫。

legendary.name: Fey Beguilement (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Iggwilv的目标是在她60英尺范围内她能看到的一个生物。目标必须成功地进行 "魅力拯救"，否则就会被精灵附身。当被附身时，目标必须服从Iggwilv的命令。目标可以在每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功，就可以驱逐精灵并结束对自己的影响。

trait.name: Confusing Burble
entries: The jabberwock burbles to itself unless it is {@condition incapacitated}. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the jabberwock and is able to hear its burbling must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn, and it rolls a {@dice d4} to determine what it does during its current turn:

items.entry: 该生物除了用它所有的动作向一个随机的方向移动外，什么也不做。
该生物要么对它能看到的随机生物进行一次近战攻击，要么如果没有可见的生物在它的范围内，就什么都不做。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果麻雀的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 刺鸦在其回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果麻雀受到砍击伤害，这个特性在它的下一回合开始时将不起作用。只有在它的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生的情况下，刺猬才会死亡。

trait.name: Uncanny Tracker
entries: 叽叽喳喳鸟可以准确无误地追踪它在过去24小时内伤害过的任何生物，只要它们两个在同一个平面上，它就知道与猎物的距离和方向。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 叽叽喳喳的鸟儿进行了两次Rend攻击。

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5})重击伤害。

action.name: Fiery Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: 除非它是{@condition blinded}，否则叽叽喳喳会从它的眼睛发出一条120英尺长、5英尺宽的火线。这条火线上的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 18}灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败，会受到31({@damage 7d8})的火力伤害，如果蓄力成功，会受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: 叽叽喳喳鸟进行一次尾部攻击。

legendary.name: Rend Attack (2 Actions)
entries: 叽叽喳喳的鸟儿进行一次Rend攻击。

legendary.name: Wing Attack (3 Actions)
entries: 叽叽喳喳地拍打它的翅膀。10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 18}灵巧的投掷中成功，否则会受到8({@damage 1d6 + 5})的重击伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Jingle Jangle可以在她的每个回合中采取脱离或隐藏行动作为额外行动。

action.name: Flail of Locks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 3d4})重击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kelek casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Kelek wears {@item bracers of defense} and carries a {@item staff of striking} with 10 charges. The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}; on a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 凯列克使用巫师之力、打击之杖或它们的组合进行三次攻击。他可以用法术攻击来代替其中一次攻击。

action.name: Sorcerer's Bolt
entries: {@atk ms,rs}{@hit 6}命中，距离5英尺或范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d12})武力伤害。

action.name: Staff of Striking
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})重击伤害，或在双手使用时造成9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})重击伤害，并且凯雷克可以消耗最多3个法杖的炸药，每消耗一个炸药就会造成额外的3 ({@damage 1d6})武力伤害。

action.name: Fiery Explosion {@recharge 4}
entries: 凯雷克以他能看到的120英尺范围内的一个点为中心，创造出一个神奇的火焰爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败时受到35({@damage 10d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功时受到一半的伤害。

reaction.name: Arcane Defense (3/Day)
entries: 当他被攻击击中时，Kelek用一个{@condition invisible}的魔法力量屏障保护自己。直到他的下一个回合结束，他将获得+5的攻击力加成，包括对触发的攻击。

monster.name: Kettlesteam the Kenku
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of her Mimicry trait

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kettlesteam casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Kettlesteam can mimic any sounds she has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kettlesteam进行了两次匕首攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Twilight Sleep (2/Day)
entries: Kettlesteam的目标是在她10英尺范围内她能看到的一个生物。目标会被一团神奇的、诱导睡眠的气体所吞噬，并且必须在{@dc 13}宪法救赎中成功，否则会在1分钟内倒下{@condition unconscious}。如果一个被这种气体催眠的生物受到伤害，或者有人使用动作摇晃或拍打睡眠者，它就会立即醒来。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the doll is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the doll move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the doll is animate.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 娃娃在其回合开始时重新获得5点生命值。如果玩偶受到火或精神伤害，这个特性在玩偶的下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有当玩偶在其回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会被摧毁。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 这个娃娃不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

action.name: Grabby Hands
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 6})，并在其每个回合开始时受到11({@damage 2d10})的精神伤害，直到这个抓捕结束。娃娃每次只能抓取一个生物。

bonus.name: Cackle {@recharge 4}
entries: The doll cackles as it targets one or two creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target that can hear the doll's cackling must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw, succeeding automatically if it has an Intelligence of 4 or lower. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage and is {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute as it is overcome by a fit of laughter. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this doll's Cackle for 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mercion casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Mercion挥舞着一根+1的四分法杖。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mercion进行一次神圣光芒攻击和一次+1的四肢杖攻击。她可以用一次法术攻击来代替其中的一次攻击。

action.name: Divine Radiance
entries: {@atk ms,rs}{@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺或范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) 辐射伤害。

action.name: +1 Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害，或在双手使用时造成7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Radiant Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: Mercion以她能看到的120英尺范围内的一个点为中心，创造了一个火热光芒的魔法爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 13}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到28({@damage 8d6})辐射伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 在携带{@item Witchlight vane|WbtW}的时候，光会施展以下一种法术，不需要法术组件，并使用魅力作为施法能力（法术保全{@dc 13}，{@hit 5}以法术攻击命中）。
will: {@spell polymorph} (after casting, roll a {@dice d8}; on a roll of 3 or 8, Light can't cast the spell again until the next dawn)

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Light has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Light carries and is attuned to the {@item Witchlight vane|WbtW}. In Light's hands, the vane is a finesse weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 光线进行两次{@item Witchlight vane|WbtW}的攻击。

action.name: Witchlight Vane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害加上4 ({@damage 1d8})辐射伤害。

bonus.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen (1/Day)
entries: 光明神奇地传送，连同他所穿戴或携带的任何装备，最多30英尺到他能看到的无人的空间。直到他的下一个回合开始时，他看起来像个幽灵，并获得对所有伤害的抵抗。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 在携带{@item Witchlight watch|WbtW}时，女巫可以施展以下一种法术，不需要法术组件，并使用智力作为施法能力（法术保存{@dc 13}，{@hit 5}以法术攻击命中）。
will: {@spell invisibility} (after casting, roll a {@dice d8}; on a roll of 3 or 8, Witch can't cast the spell again until the next dawn)

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Witch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Witch carries and is attuned to the {@item Witchlight watch|WbtW}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 女巫做了两次手杖攻击。

action.name: Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})重击伤害加上6 ({@damage 1d12})坏死伤害。

bonus.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen (1/Day)
entries: 巫师神奇地将他和他所穿戴或携带的任何装备一起传送到他能看到的未被占用的空间，最远可达30英尺。直到他的下一个回合开始，他看起来像个幽灵，并获得对所有伤害的抵抗。

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 当受到允许灵巧救赎只受一半伤害的效果时，只要莫里弗不是{@condition incapacitated}，救赎成功时不受伤害，救赎失败时受一半伤害。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Molliver wears +1 leather armor and {@item boots of levitation}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 莫里弗进行两次匕首或短剑攻击，或各一次。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。如果莫里弗在攻击卷上有优势，或者目标在莫里弗的盟友之一的5英尺范围内，攻击会造成额外的7({@damage 2d6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。如果莫里弗在攻击卷上有优势，或者目标在莫里弗的盟友5英尺内，则攻击会造成额外的7({@damage 2d6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Levitate
entries: 穿着浮空靴时，莫里弗施展{@spell levitate}(仅限自身)。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 只要他们能看到攻击者，莫里弗就能使他们从针对他们的攻击中受到的伤害减半。

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The paper bird has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Sharp Edges
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}1次砍击伤害。

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3次穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: 在她的每个回合中，雷齐尔可以使用一个额外的行动来进行冲刺、脱离或隐藏行动。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Raezil has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Raezil deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of hers that isn't incapacitated and Raezil doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Raezil进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ringlerun casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Ringlerun wields a {@item staff of power}. It has 20 charges when fully charged and regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls but loses its other properties; on a 20, it regains {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ringlerun makes three {@item staff of power} or Freezing Ray attacks. He can replace one of those attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Staff of Power
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})重击伤害，或在双手使用时造成5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})重击伤害，并且林格伦可以消耗法杖的1次充能来造成额外的3 ({@damage 1d6})武力伤害。

action.name: Freezing Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8}击中，范围120英尺，一个生物。{@h}27 ({@damage 6d8})寒冷伤害。

action.name: Staff Spell
entries: 当持有他的{@item staff of power}时，林格伦可以消耗1个或更多的电荷，从它那里施放以下的法术（法术保存{@dc 14}，{@hit 8}用法术攻击击中）。寒冷之锥（{@damage 8d8}寒冷伤害；5次充电），火球（{@damage 10d6}火焰伤害；5次充电），无敌之球（6次充电），控制怪物（5次充电），浮空（2次充电），闪电（{@damage 10d6}闪电伤害；5次充电），魔法导弹（1次充电），削弱之光（1次充电），或力墙（5次充电）。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The Selenelion twins, Gleam and Glister, have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 只要双胞胎都活着并且彼此在60英尺范围内，塞莱尼翁的双胞胎就会在她的回合开始时重新获得5点生命值。一个双胞胎只有在她的回合开始时生命值为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

trait.name: Twin Bond
entries: 当Selenelion双胞胎都活着并在同一个平面上存在时，每个人都能意识到对方的情绪。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Moon Ray (Gleam Only; 3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5}击中，范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})辐射伤害，目标必须在{@dc 13}智慧救赎中成功，否则将被转化为蝙蝠，持续1分钟，如同受到{@spell polymorph}法术影响。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

action.name: Sun Ray (Glister Only; 3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5}击中，范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})辐射伤害，目标必须成功进行{@dc 13}智慧救赎，否则会被{@condition blinded}1分钟。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功后结束对自己的影响。

action.name: Twin Sight (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: In her mind's eye, a Selenelion twin can see what the other twin sees for up to 1 minute, provided both twins are alive and on the same plane of existence. Maintaining this effect requires {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sir Talavar's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components. As the dragon ages and changes color, it gains additional spells as shown below.

trait.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: As a bonus action, Sir Talavar can magically turn {@condition invisible} until his {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). Any equipment Sir Talavar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with him.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: 使用心灵感应，塔拉瓦爵士可以与他周围60英尺内的任何其他精灵龙进行魔法交流。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 塔拉瓦爵士在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

action.name: +1 Tiny Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}1次穿刺伤害。

action.name: Euphoria Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 塔拉瓦爵士向他周围5英尺内的一个生物呼出一口欣快气体。目标必须在一个{@dc 11}的智慧救赎中成功，或者在1分钟内，目标不能做出反应，并且必须在每个回合开始时掷出{@dice d6}来决定它在回合内的行为。
目标不采取任何行动或奖励行动，并使用其所有的运动向一个随机方向移动。
目标不会移动，它唯一能做的是做一个{@dc 11}智慧救赎，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Skabatha casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Boon of Immortality
entries: 斯卡巴塔对任何会使她衰老的效果都有免疫力，而且她不会因年老而死亡。

trait.name: Forgetfulness
entries: The first creature that Skabatha sees after she finishes a long rest is {@condition invisible} to her. She can't remember seeing the creature or perceive it using her truesight until the end of her next long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Skabatha进行了两次爪击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4})毒药伤害。

bonus.name: Alter Size
entries: Skabatha神奇地将自己缩小到小尺寸（4至8英寸高）或恢复到正常尺寸。如果Skabatha没有足够的空间恢复到她的正常大小，她就会在现有的空间里达到可能的最大尺寸。她所穿戴或携带的任何东西都会随着她而改变大小。

As a Tiny creature, Skabatha deals 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage when she hits with a Claw attack. She has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks, and disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. Her statistics otherwise remain unchanged.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Skylla casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Skylla携带一根长生法杖（见附录A），有10次充电。法杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果它的最后一次充电被耗尽，请掷出{@dice d20}；如果是1，法杖将被摧毁。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Skylla进行两次长生杖攻击。她可以用一次法术攻击来代替其中一次攻击。

action.name: Eldritch Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})重击伤害，或在双手使用时造成4 ({@damage 1d8})重击伤害，并且Skylla可以消耗最多3个法杖的电荷，每消耗一个电荷就会造成额外的4 ({@damage 1d8})雷电伤害。

reaction.name: Eldritch Escape
entries: When Skylla takes damage, she can expend 3 charges of her eldritch staff to turn {@condition invisible} and teleport, along with any equipment she's wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see. She remains {@condition invisible} until the start of her next turn or until she attacks or casts a spell.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If Squirt is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed Squirt move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that Squirt is animate.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 斯奎特不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})重击伤害。

action.name: Boggle Oil (3 Applications)
entries: Squirt expends 1 application of boggle oil to create a 10-foot-square puddle of slippery, non-flammable oil on the ground within 5 feet of it. The puddle is {@quickref difficult terrain||3} and lasts for 1 hour. Each creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. Boggles are unaffected by the oil. After it expends all 3 applications, Squirt can't use this action again until its supply of boggle oil is replenished.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Strongheart casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: 坚强的心挥舞着钢铁，这是一把有生命的、合法的长剑（见附录A）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 强心剂进行了三次钢铁攻击。

action.name: Steel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage when used with two hands. Once on each of his turns, Strongheart can also cause the blade to gleam with holy light. If he does so, the target is {@condition blinded} until the start of Strongheart's next turn.

action.name: Revivify (Recharges at the Next Dawn)
entries: 当持有钢铁时，强心剂会施放{@spell revivify}。

reaction.name: Protect Another
entries: 当Strongheart能看到的生物攻击另一个在他5英尺范围内的生物时，Strongheart可以用他的反应在攻击卷上施加劣势，只要他带着盾牌。

monster.name: Swarm of Campestris
languages: understands Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: 蜂群中的每一个Campestri都能模仿它所听到的任何声音或歌曲，尽管是用鼻音假声。

trait.name: Swarm
entries: 蜂群可以占据另一个生物的空间，反之亦然，而且蜂群可以通过任何足以容纳一个单独营地的开口移动。虫群不能恢复命中率，也不能获得临时命中率。

action.name: Head Butts
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 4d4})重击伤害，如果蜂群有一半的命中率或更少，则有5 ({@damage 2d4})重击伤害。

action.name: Spores (1/Day)
entries: 孢子的半径为20英尺，从孢子群中延伸出来。这些孢子可以绕过角落，而且它们对结构体、元素体、植物或亡灵没有影响。该区域内的每个其他生物必须做一个{@dc 10}智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物将受到1%的伤害，其速度减半，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功，则结束对它的影响。

items.name: Change Shape
entries: 瑟宁斯可以使自己像一张羊皮纸一样平坦，也可以恢复到他的正常厚度。在他被压扁的状态下，他可以从门下滑过，把自己卷起来，甚至把自己折成书页。

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: 当锡兵在一个{@spell antimagic field}的区域内时，会失去行动能力。如果被{@spell dispel magic}击中，锡兵必须对施法者的法术救赎DC进行宪法救赎成功，否则就会昏迷1分钟。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 虽然锡兵保持不动，但它与普通的盔甲没有区别。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 锡兵进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})重击伤害。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the treant is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the treant move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the treant is animate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 树人进行两次猛烈攻击。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: 树人用魔法使它所看到的60英尺范围内的一棵或两棵树变得生动。这些树具有与被唤醒的树相同的统计信息（见《怪物手册》），只是它们不能说话。被激活的树可以作为树人的盟友。这棵树在1天内保持有生命，或者直到它死亡，直到树人死亡或者离这棵树超过120英尺，或者直到树人采取额外行动把它变成无生命的树。如果可能的话，这棵树会生根。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Warduke wears a dread helm (see appendix A) and wields a {@item flame tongue} longsword.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Warduke进行三次火焰之舌或匕首攻击。

action.name: Flame Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，距离5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})的砍击伤害，或在双手使用时造成8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})的砍击伤害，如果武器被烧毁，再加上7 ({@damage 2d6})的火焰伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

bonus.name: Flaming Blade
entries: Warduke点燃或熄灭他的焰舌长剑。在燃烧时，它在半径40英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外40英尺的范围内发出暗光。

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Warduke恢复了13点生命值。

items.name: Magic Boon (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: 威尔士会给它周围5英尺内的一个非亡灵的生物一个好处。受益者会获得一个{@dice d4}，并且可以在接下来的24小时内的任何时候，掷出这个骰子，并将掷出的数字加到它所做的一个能力检查、攻击卷或自救动作上。任何生物在同一时间都不能拥有超过一个这样的魔法奖励。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 这只手可以施展以下一种法术，使用魅力作为施法能力。

trait.name: Secret Expertise
entries: 这只手有这些额外的技能之一。{@skill Acrobatics} {@skillCheck acrobatics 6}, {@skill Animal Handling} {@skillCheck animal_handling 5}, {@skill Arcana} {@skillCheck arcana 5}, {@skill Athletics} {@skillCheck athletics 4}, {@skill Medicine} {@skillCheck medicine 5}, 或{@skill Performance} {@skillCheck performance 5}。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 4}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Pixie Dust (1/Day)
entries: 这只手将一撮精灵尘洒在它自己或它能看到的5英尺范围内的其他生物身上。接受者获得30英尺的飞行速度，持续1分钟。如果该生物在该效果结束时是在空中，它将安全地落到地面上，不受任何伤害，并以脚着地。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zarak carries a {@item potion of invisibility}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 扎拉克进行了两次匕首攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害，如果目标是生物且扎拉克至少有18点命中率，则额外增加5 ({@damage 2d4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Garrote
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个人形生物。{@h}8({@damage 2d4 + 3})的砍击伤害，并且目标{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 11})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标在每个回合开始时受到8({@damage 2d4 + 3})的砍击伤害，并且扎拉克不能抓捕其他生物或使用刺客之心。

bonus.name: Assassin's Whim
entries: 扎拉克采取冲刺、脱离或隐藏行动。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 扎拉克在看到攻击者的情况下，从对他的攻击中受到的伤害减半。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zargash casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Cling to Life (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: 扎尔加什第一次会因为受到伤害而下降到0命中率，但他反而下降到1命中率。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zargash wears a bat-shaped amulet that has the properties of a {@item ring of feather falling}.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})重击伤害，或在双手使用时造成7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})重击伤害。

action.name: Deathly Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5}击中，范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3})坏死性伤害。

bonus.name: Animate Corpse (1/Day)
entries: Zargash targets the lifeless corpse of one Humanoid he can see within 30 feet of him and commands it to rise, transforming it into a zombie under his control. The zombie takes its turn immediately after Zargash. Animating the zombie requires Zargash's {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). The zombie reverts to an inanimate corpse after 10 minutes, when it drops to 0 hit points, or when Zargash's {@status concentration} ends.
